title: I Got Perma-Banned
body: I got perma-banned about 2 days ago and I didn't get a warning or anything, and there is no email that was sent to my gmail.

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you haven't received a notice via email regarding your suspension and you're genuinely unsure about why you were banned then you'll have to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to discuss the details of your ban.

We here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.
Dont script or don't lose so many games and be toxic is either the problem
